attributes.action: Funding for the creation of a Great British Rebel Army
attributes.additional_details:
Petition to start, fund a Great British Rebel Army, very similar to the Libyan rebels apart from we will probably wear red white and blue clothing with reversible camouflage colours.
Funding to be taken from the same secret accounts that exist for such financial assistance.
This army can then be used to overthrow the Great British Government.
We the signed want the Commonwealth to also help set up this Rebel Army with training and help with tactical training.Oh, if possible a matt black truck would be nice too.
